original_text: Amasa was not on his guard against the dagger in Joab’s hand, and Joab plunged it into his belly, and his intestines spilled out on the ground. Without being stabbed again, Amasa died. Then Joab and his brother Abishai pursued Sheba son of Bikri.
korean_text: 아마사가 요압의 손에 있는 칼은 주의하지 아니한지라 요압이 칼로 그의 배를 찌르매 그의 창자가 땅에 쏟아지니 그를 다시 치지 아니하여도 죽으니라

sentences.original_text: Amasa was not on his guard
against the dagger in Joab's hand
and Joab plunged it into his belly
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 요압은 그것을 아마사의 배에 찔러 넣었고

sentences.original_text: and his intestines spilled out on the ground
Then Joab and his brother Abishai
